issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tap on spinner button does not display the alert message.
This is not regression. This issue occurs in 2.0.X as well.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink >Controls >System Buttons.
2. Click on 'Set button Group 5'.
3. Click on the spinner in the toolbar.

Actual:
It does not display the alert message.

Expected:
It should display the alert message with its appropriate name.
fields.summary: iOS: System Buttons - Tap on spinner button does not display the alert message.
fields.environment:
Tested with SDK: 2.1.0.v20120615184153
Tested with Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206161113
Device: iPhone 3GS (v 5.0.1), iPhone simulator
OS: Mac OSX Version 10.7.3

Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
